page.title: 17 Housing
page.content: We have been asking the children in our school about the type of{housing } in which they live. The most common type of house is a semi-detatched house with three bedrooms, one bathroom, a lounge, a kitchen and a dining room. Two people live in houses which they use as{shops.}One of the houses is three hundred years old and is used as a gift shop and the other is used as a fish and chip shop. We also asked about what type of { {heating }people use. The most common types were gas and electricity. Other types were coal, oil and wood. Some people had ways of insulating their{homes.}Most people had loft insulation but only six had double glazing and only one had wall insulation.
